name: Bounty game
description:
Do you have a dream of becoming rich overnight? Then come and make that dream come true in The Bounty Game!!!

Compete in The Bounty Game, where you'll compete with challengers from all over the world to take home great game prizes! You'll need to use your nimble positioning to avoid one deadly trap after another in five different styles of levels. Of course, the dangers you face are not only from the organizers, each player can choose a skill action to influence other players' games. Only by mastering the secrets of the level and attacking your opponents effectively in the game will you be able to turn on the champagne of victory that belongs to you!

Up to 50 players on the same stage, but only one winner at the end!

50 players from all over the world will compete together. You will be one of them and experience the challenges from the dangerous levels where you will face the classic childhood game (please note! It is also a deadly presence). At the same time the other challengers will not let you pass so easily, you will need to dodge their attacks, but also to take the initiative to eliminate others. Remember, everyone has only one goal, to win the final prize.

Random level mode to make each game feel fresh

When you enter the game, you will face 5 levels randomly selected from dozens of levels from simple to difficult, the game content of each level will be randomly selected from the game organizer, and there will be randomness in each game even for the same level.
Different levels and different opponents will give you a fresh experience in each game. In each match, the levels you encounter are random, and you never know what's next! Also you will face contestants from all over the world with different operating styles and strange strategies, can you complete such a challenge?

Thrilling and interactive PK, never trust the people around you

In the game, every player operates in the same way, in addition to the basic movement, running, crouching, etc., in the "bounty game" also added more room for operation: slide shovel, air flip, etc.. On top of that, each player can choose an exclusive interactive skill before entering the level: push, pull, and hit. Use the skills to effectively eliminate all the opponents who are working against you.
For each match, you'll need more than just handling, strategy, and even a little luck to be the last man in the house. Use your skills to get your opponents out of the tournament, and of course, everyone else thinks so too.

Fight for millions of dollars in the game. The farther you advance, the more payoffs you'll get! Fame, money, the more powerful you become! We've created this dream world just for you to enjoy, the game, the dream, and the bounty! Who doesn't love bright gold coins!
And what we enjoy, is your fights and fights! Who are we? We are the voyeurs beside you！
